Newbie Guide:
Newbie Guides offer teleportation between Newbie Town to any character below level20.
if you use this service, it is also possible to visit the starting villige of another race trough a
Newbie Guide.
But be careful how you use this advantage -- it is normal to learn a specific skill or perform a specific quest at the designated town of each race.
Once a player reaches level 20, he is no longer able to teleport using the Newbie Travel Token.
